title: ModsJson
description: Schema for a mods.json configuration file.

newestDependencies.description: A list of dependencies and the version to set when bumping

mods.description: A list of mods to be built

version.description: The version to tag the built artifact with

dependencies.description: An optional list of mod IDs that must be built before this mod can be built

build.description: The command to run for building the mod

qmod.description: The command to run for packaging the qmod

branch.description: The branch or tag to checkout

prebump.description: The command to run before bumping the version
